channel.title: Comments on: Scratch Off Lottery Retirement Plan

item.title: By: JRBeaman
item.dc:creator: JRBeaman
item.description: In only the last 5 years, you could have made 5 times your money investing in silver or gold. That is still a good investment with the value of currency going down all the time.
item.content:encoded: In only the last 5 years, you could have made 5 times your money investing in silver or gold. That is still a good investment with the value of currency going down all the time.

item.title: By: Dano
item.dc:creator: Dano
item.description:
Desperate measures for desperate people. Playing the lottery, is a waist of time and an epidemic in America.
Peace...
item.content:encoded:
Desperate measures for desperate people. Playing the lottery, is a waist of time and an epidemic in America.
